name: TOS Space Strike
description:
Hello guys!

A new series starts here The Outer Space or TOS. The first game in this series and my third game TOS Space Strike or TOS Strike or Interstellar Strike is an action, adventure space shooter game. This is also as an apologies to my 2nd game. Download and check this game out and consider following.

Story

commander lost in space is on a mission fighting against all odds to save his planet

Controls

  • Left click and move your mouse to move the spaceship
  • Space to shoot
